titles.title: SERVE Act of 2009
Supporting Emergency Responders Volunteer Efforts Act of 2009

To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow a $1,000 refundable credit for individuals who are bona fide volunteer members of volunteer firefighting and emergency medical service organizations.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

term.name: Emergency medical services and trauma care
Social work, volunteer service, charitable organizations

bill.summary: 5/21/2009--Introduced. Supporting Emergency Responders Volunteer Efforts Act of 2009 or the SERVE Act of 2009 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow a $1,000 refundable tax credit for individuals who are bona fide volunteer members of a qualified volunteer emergency response organization who provide firefighting and prevention services, emergency medical services, and ambulance services.
